MIDIOutput.summary: The MIDIOutput interface of the provides methods to add messages to the queue of an output device, and to clear the queue of messages.

MIDIOutputClear.summary: The clear() method of the interface clears the queue of messages being sent to the output device.

MIDIOutputSend.summary: The send() method of the interface queues messages for the corresponding MIDI port. The message can be sent immediately, or with an optional timestamp to delay sending.
